overview: Snatched off the street and out of their beds, these helpless girls worst nightmares have just begun.  These lost girls perform unspeakable acts of sexual depravity of face hard punishment. Desperate and alone, they attempt to please rather than face more whippings or spend all night dangling inches from the floor, but of course their efforts are futile in the endless nightmare.
tagline: Snatched off the street and out of their beds, these helpless girls worst nightmares have just begun.
title: Sold Into Slavery
